about_the_game:
This is an adult visual novel series featuring a stunning red-haired futanari as the protagonist. In this episode, the story unfolds at a luxurious spa center.

GAME DESCRIPTION

Kira wakes up after a wild night with her hookup, suddenly remembering she has an appointment at the spa.
With Sarah by her side, she is warmly greeted by June, the spa receptionist, with whom she once had a fling.
As Kira prepares to step into the shower, June approaches her with eyes full of desire, begging for her touch one last time.
What will Kira do? Will she leave Sarah waiting in the shower while she shares a passionate moment with June? Or will she join Sarah in the steamy shower, leaving June to fantasize about her?
Play our game to find out!

FEATURES

- HD renders
- Image gallery

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults and includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. 
The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. 
All characters depicted are 18 years old and over.
Contains nudity, alternative lifestyles, graphic depictions  of oral, vaginal, anal, masturbation and non-penetrative sexual acts, bodily fluids.
Contains straight sex scenes.
Sexual scenes involving transgender characters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
